summary:
Follow Learning English vocabulary in your podcast app to find the latest episodes of English in a minute and more programs to improve your English.
It's a verb and a noun, and you can say it as schedule or schedule.
As a noun, it can be a plan or a list of when things happen.
A schedule can tell you when planes, trains, and buses are planned to arrive at and depart from different places.
As a verb, schedule means to plan for something to happen at a certain time.
